description:
Push off in these skate skis. For fitness skate skiers and amateur racers, these blades strike a nice balance of performance and ease of use. In slightly shorter lengths, these blades are easier to control. They're inspired by Rossignol's race-caliber skis, so they still offer sharp edges and a low resistance base for exceptional glide. From double poling practice to testing yourself in competition, these skis are happy to do it all.

  • Active cap construction flexes from tip to tail and offers good torsional rigidity
  • Extended edge offers good control and glide
  • Low Density Core for lightweight performance
  • Double guide groove for good control in different positions
  • K7000 graphite base glides on variable snow conditions
  • Compatible with NNN bindings and includes pre-mounted IFP plates
name: Rossignol Delta Sport Skate Skis - Unisex
